details.description: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications made of stone, brick, tamped earth, wood, and other materials, built along the northern borders of China.

photos.description: A panoramic 4K view of the Great Wall of China.
4K image of the Great Wall snaking through the mountains.

reviews.comment: A historical marvel with stunning views.

nearby_attractions.name: Mutianyu Great Wall
nearby_attractions.description: A well-preserved section of the Great Wall offering beautiful scenery.

nearby_attractions.name: Forbidden City
nearby_attractions.description: A large palace complex in central Beijing.

details.description: Petra is a famous archaeological site in Jordan's southwestern desert. Dating to around 300 B.C., it was the capital of the Nabataean Kingdom.

photos.description: A 4K view of the Treasury in Petra.
The Monastery in Petra captured in 4K resolution.

reviews.comment: A breathtaking historical site with stunning architecture.
Absolutely worth the visit, an unforgettable experience.

nearby_attractions.name: Little Petra
nearby_attractions.description: A smaller archaeological site near Petra, also worth visiting.

nearby_attractions.name: Wadi Rum
nearby_attractions.description: A protected desert wilderness with dramatic landscapes.

location.address: Parque Nacional da Tijuca - Alto da Boa Vista, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, Brazil

details.description: Christ the Redeemer is an Art Deco statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. It was created by French sculptor Paul Landowski and built by Brazilian engineer Heitor da Silva Costa.

photos.description: A 4K image of Christ the Redeemer overlooking Rio de Janeiro.
Close-up 4K shot of Christ the Redeemer.

reviews.comment: A must-see in Rio! The views are spectacular.
Incredible statue, but it can get very crowded.

nearby_attractions.name: Sugarloaf Mountain
nearby_attractions.description: A peak situated at the mouth of Guanabara Bay.

nearby_attractions.name: Copacabana Beach
nearby_attractions.description: One of the most famous beaches in the world.

details.description: Machu Picchu is a 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Eastern Cordillera of southern Peru on a mountain ridge 2,430 meters above sea level.

photos.description: A 4K panoramic view of Machu Picchu.
The ancient ruins of Machu Picchu in 4K.

reviews.comment: A breathtaking site with incredible history.
An unforgettable experience. The scenery is unmatched.

nearby_attractions.name: Huayna Picchu
nearby_attractions.description: A mountain in Peru that rises over Machu Picchu.

nearby_attractions.name: Cusco
nearby_attractions.description: A city in the Peruvian Andes and the former capital of the Inca Empire.

details.description: Chichen Itza was a large pre-Columbian city built by the Maya people of the Terminal Classic period.

photos.description: A 4K view of the Pyramid of Kukulcan at Chichen Itza.
4K image of the Temple of the Warriors in Chichen Itza.

reviews.comment: An amazing archaeological site with rich history.
Absolutely stunning, a must-visit when in Mexico.

nearby_attractions.name: Cenote Ik Kil
nearby_attractions.description: A beautiful natural sinkhole near Chichen Itza.

nearby_attractions.name: Valladolid
nearby_attractions.description: A colonial city with charming architecture and history.

location.address: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Roma RM, Italy

details.description: The Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater in the center of Rome, Italy, and one of the greatest works of Roman architecture and engineering.

photos.description: A 4K view of the Roman Colosseum.
Interior 4K shot of the Colosseum's architecture.

reviews.comment: An iconic symbol of ancient Rome, a must-visit!

nearby_attractions.name: Roman Forum
nearby_attractions.description: Ancient ruins in the heart of Rome, next to the Colosseum.

nearby_attractions.name: Palatine Hill
nearby_attractions.description: One of the most ancient parts of the city.

location.address: Dharmapuri, Forest Colony, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001, India

details.description: The Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the southern bank of the river Yamuna in the Indian city of Agra.

photos.description: A 4K view of the Taj Mahal at sunrise.
The Taj Mahal reflected in the water, captured in 4K.

reviews.comment: Absolutely beautiful, a must-see in India.

nearby_attractions.name: Agra Fort
nearby_attractions.description: A historical fort in the city of Agra.
